text: vema ce`alna ashabe-nnari illa melaikeh. vema ce`alna `iddetehum illa fitnetel lillezine keferu liyesteykine-llezine utu-lkitabe veyezdade-llezine amenu imanev vela yertabe-llezine utu-lkitabe velmu'minune veliyekule-llezine fi kulubihim meraduv velkafirune maza erade-llahu bihaza mesela. kezalike yudillu-llahu mey yesau veyehdi mey yesa'. vema ya`lemu cunude rabbike illa hu. vema hiye illa zikra lilbeser
